insert into hospital_info (company_id,company_name,city_id,city_name,hospital_id,hospital_name,address,lng,lat,settable) SELECT DISTINCT c.id AS company_id , c.title AS company_name , h.city AS city_id , r.name AS city_name , h.id AS hospital_id , h.name AS hospital_name , h.address , h.lng , h.lat , case when h.lng is not null and h.lat is not null then 1 else 0 end as settable FROM quancheng_db.16860_client c LEFT OUTER JOIN quancheng_db.16860_hospital_clients hc ON c.id = hc.client_id and hc.deleted_at is null LEFT OUTER JOIN quancheng_db.16860_hospitals h ON h.id = hc.hospital_id and h.deleted_at is null INNER JOIN quancheng_db.16860_region r ON r.id = h.city and r.deleted_at is null where h.status = '1' and c.deleted_at is null
and c.id in (${companyIdList })
and h.city in (${cityIdList })
and c.title in (${companyNameList })
and r.name in (${cityNameList })
